Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22038181]LC50>200 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Function: The synthetic lasiocepsin possessed antimicrobial activity against both Gram-positive and -negative bacteria, antifungal activity against Candida albicans, and weak hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Lasiocepsin, a novel cyclic antimicrobial peptide from the venom of eusocial bee Lasioglossum laticeps (Hymenoptera Halictidae).
Literature.Author: Monincová L, Slaninová J, Fucík V, Hovorka O, Voburka Z, Bednárová L, Malon P, Stokrová J, Cerovský V.
